name: Monthly Cost
description: Fixed costs are calculated monthly. Things like rent, gas, etc. are included in this.
hint: Charges should be recorded on a monthly basis.

name: Material Cost
description: These costs are intended for one project (to give the best estimate).
hint: Charges are intended for one project.

name: Labor Cost
description: These costs are based on your current staffing operations
hint: Charges are on a per hour basis
